scripts.ixc: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix projeto-ixc-backend" "npm run dev --prefix projeto-ixc-frontend"
scripts.build: concurrently "npm run build --prefix projeto-ixc-backend" "npm run build --prefix projeto-ixc-frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix projeto-ixc-backend" "npm run start --prefix projeto-ixc-frontend"
